metadata.name: Slava Ukraini!
metadata.description:
The people of Ukraine are under siege and are in need of our help. 

To that end we are auctioning off this 1/1, created by Fidel Amos and Adam Goldman, an homage to their S.H.E. collection.

100% of the sale of this NFT will go to two charities providing aid to Ukrainian children and families affected by war: 

Voice of Children 
(https://voices.org.ua/en/)

&

Save The Children (https://support.savethechildren.org/site/Donation2?df_id=5751&mfc_pref=T&5751.donation=form1). 

The model pictured is also part Ukrainian, and is in full support of our efforts to donate to those in need during this time.
